title: Fruit cake
ingredients: ['240g dried cranberries', '140g dried apricots, finely chopped', '140g sultanas', '180g cut mixed peel', '115ml brandy', '225g butter, at room temperature', '280g caster sugar', '4 large eggs', '1/4 teaspoon orange extract', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '450g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '225ml orange juice', 'Glaze', 'icing sugar', 'orange juice']
